General.Name: Magna Finance Tbk
General.Description: PT Magna Investama Mandiri Tbk operates hotel in Indonesia. It also engages in the rental of apartments. The company was formerly known as PT Magna Finance Tbk and changed its name to PT Magna Investama Mandiri Tbk in November 2017. PT Magna Investama Mandiri Tbk was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Rukan Permata Senayan Blok E-50, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12210
